meaningMnemonic: The part of <radical>rice</radical> that <radical>stand</radical>s up tall in the air (at the end of the stalks) is the <kanji>grains</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You have a box of <kanji>grains</kanji>. <reading>Ryuu</reading> (りゅう) from Street Fighter is doing training by punching the grains to strengthen his fingers.
